title: Who Is Bitcoin Creator Satoshi Nakamoto? What We Know—and Don’t Know
sub_head: In an age in which it is hard to be anonymous, the identity of the cryptocurrency’s inventor remains a mystery
body: Thirteen years ago a person or group using the name Satoshi Nakamoto released a paper describing a new software system called bitcoin. Today bitcoin is worth more than $1 trillion and has sparked a phenomenon that, its proponents believe, might rewire the entire global financial network.
